info.name: EDULIVES - Admin Staff API
info.description: API collection for the Admin Staff module in EDULIVES application

request.description: Retrieves a list of all students with optional filtering
Retrieves detailed information about a specific student

body.raw:
{
    "name": "John Doe",
    "gender": "Male",
    "dateOfBirth": "2008-05-15",
    "admissionNumber": "ADM2023001",
    "rollNumber": "10A001",
    "class": "10",
    "section": "A",
    "academicYear": "2023-2024",
    "admissionDate": "2023-06-01",
    "parentInfo": {
        "fatherName": "Robert Doe",
        "motherName": "Sarah Doe",
        "guardianName": "Robert Doe",
        "contactNumber": "9876543210",
        "alternateContact": "8765432109",
        "email": "parent@example.com",
        "address": "123 Main Street, City",
        "occupation": "Engineer"
    },
    "previousSchool": {
        "name": "Previous School Name",
        "board": "CBSE",
        "grade": "9",
        "yearOfPassing": "2023"
    },
    "medicalInfo": {
        "bloodGroup": "O+",
        "allergies": "None",
        "medicalConditions": "None"
    },
    "documents": {
        "birthCertificate": true,
        "transferCertificate": true,
        "previousMarksheets": true,
        "addressProof": true
    }
}

request.description: Registers a new student in the system
Updates information for an existing student
Generates an ID card for a student

body.raw:
{
    "studentId": "{{studentId}}",
    "transferType": "Internal",
    "fromClass": "10",
    "fromSection": "A",
    "toClass": "10",
    "toSection": "B",
    "reason": "Balance class strength",
    "effectiveDate": "2023-09-01"
}

request.description: Processes a student transfer between classes or to another school
Retrieves a list of all staff members with optional filtering
Retrieves detailed information about a specific staff member
Registers a new staff member in the system
Updates information for an existing staff member
Generates an ID card for a staff member
Records attendance for staff members
Configures the fee structure for a class and academic year
Generates a fee invoice for a student

body.raw:
{
    "studentId": "{{studentId}}",
    "invoiceId": "{{invoiceId}}",
    "amount": 25000,
    "paymentDate": "2023-07-10",
    "paymentMethod": "Online Transfer",
    "transactionId": "TXN123456789",
    "remarks": "First quarter fee payment"
}

request.description: Processes a fee payment for a student
Retrieves a list of students who have not paid their fees by the due date

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Science Lab Equipment - Microscope",
    "category": "Lab Supplies",
    "quantity": 20,
    "unit": "Pieces",
    "unitPrice": 5000,
    "supplier": {
        "name": "Scientific Supplies Ltd.",
        "contactNumber": "9876543210",
        "email": "info@scientificsupplies.com"
    },
    "purchaseDate": "2023-08-15",
    "location": "Science Lab Store Room",
    "minimumStockLevel": 5,
    "description": "High-quality student microscopes for biology lab"
}

request.description: Adds a new item to the inventory
Updates an existing inventory item

body.raw:
{
    "inventoryId": "{{inventoryId}}",
    "issuedTo": "Science Department",
    "quantity": 5,
    "issueDate": "2023-09-01",
    "expectedReturnDate": "2023-12-15",
    "purpose": "For Class 10 Biology Practical",
    "remarks": "Handle with care"
}

request.description: Issues inventory items to a department or individual
Retrieves a list of inventory items that are below their minimum stock level
Adds a new transport vehicle to the fleet
Updates information for an existing transport vehicle

body.raw:
{
    "studentId": "{{studentId}}",
    "vehicleId": "{{vehicleId}}",
    "pickupStop": "Residential Complex",
    "dropStop": "Residential Complex",
    "effectiveFrom": "2023-09-01",
    "transportFee": 5000,
    "paymentFrequency": "Monthly"
}

request.description: Assigns a student to a transport vehicle and route
Generates a transport usage and fee collection report

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Auditorium",
    "type": "Event Space",
    "capacity": 500,
    "location": "Main Building, Ground Floor",
    "description": "Fully equipped auditorium with stage, sound system, and projector",
    "amenities": [
        "Sound System",
        "Projector",
        "Stage Lighting",
        "Air Conditioning",
        "Seating"
    ],
    "maintenanceSchedule": {
        "frequency": "Monthly",
        "lastMaintenance": "2023-08-15",
        "nextMaintenance": "2023-09-15"
    }
}

request.description: Adds a new facility to the school
Retrieves all facilities in the school

body.raw:
{
    "facilityId": "{{facilityId}}",
    "purpose": "Annual Science Exhibition",
    "requestedBy": {
        "id": "{{staffId}}",
        "name": "Jane Smith",
        "department": "Science"
    },
    "date": "2023-10-15",
    "startTime": "09:00",
    "endTime": "16:00",
    "attendees": 350,
    "requirements": [
        "Sound System",
        "Projector",
        "Extra Chairs"
    ]
}

request.description: Books a facility for an event or activity
Retrieves all bookings for a facility within a date range

formdata.value: Projector not working properly, image appears blurry

request.description: Reports a maintenance issue for a facility
Creates a new academic year with terms

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Annual Sports Day",
    "description": "Annual inter-house sports competition",
    "startDate": "2023-11-15",
    "endDate": "2023-11-16",
    "eventType": "Sports",
    "audience": ["All Students", "All Staff", "Parents"],
    "location": "School Grounds",
    "isHoliday": false,
    "isRecurring": false,
    "notifyDays": 7
}

request.description: Adds an event to the academic calendar
Retrieves calendar events within a date range and optional filters

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Diwali",
    "description": "Festival of Lights",
    "startDate": "2023-11-12",
    "endDate": "2023-11-13",
    "isRecurring": true,
    "recurringType": "Yearly"
}

request.description: Adds a holiday to the academic calendar
Generates a printable academic calendar for the specified academic year
Generates a report of student attendance for a class over a date range
Generates a report of staff attendance over a date range
Generates a report of fee collection for an academic term
Generates a report of student performance in exams
Generates a report of inventory usage over a date range
Configures or updates the school's basic information
Configures class sections for an academic year
Configures subjects for an academic year
Configures the timetable for a class

body.raw:
{
    "username": "john.doe",
    "email": "john.doe@example.com",
    "role": "Student",
    "linkedId": "{{studentId}}",
    "sendCredentials": true
}

request.description: Creates a user account for a student, parent, or staff member
Resets a user's password and optionally sends new credentials
Generates a transport usage and fee collection report
Sends an announcement to selected audience groups
Sends a notification to a specific class
Schedules a communication to be sent at a later date
Retrieves communication history with filters

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Fee Payment Reminder",
    "type": "Email",
    "subject": "Reminder: Fee Payment Due",
    "content": "Dear {{parentName}},

This is a reminder that the {{termName}} fee payment for your ward {{studentName}} of class {{className}} is due on {{dueDate}}. The total amount payable is {{amount}}.

Please make the payment before the due date to avoid late fees.

Regards,
Accounts Department
{{schoolName}}",
    "variables": ["parentName", "termName", "studentName", "className", "dueDate", "amount", "schoolName"],
    "category": "Finance"
}

request.description: Creates a reusable communication template
